videos.description: LeBron James throws a long pass to Anthony Davis who finishes with a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron with the long pass to AD for the dunk) 2021/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron with the long pass to AD for the dunk

videos.description: Trey Lyles gets the hoop and the harm

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trey Lyles gets the hoop and the harm) 2021/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trey Lyles gets the hoop and the harm

videos.description: Dwight Howard is left wide open beyond the arc and he knocks down the 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Howard shows off range in second quarter) 2021/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Howard shows off range in second quarter

videos.description: Russell Westbrook flies to the bucket for a powerful one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Westbrook unleashes the hammer on the Pistons) 2021/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Westbrook unleashes the hammer on the Pistons

videos.description: Anthony Davis blocks Cade Cunningham's shot attempt and then at the other end, he drops in a clutch bucket to extend the Lakers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (AD's block leads to clutch bucket) 2021/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: AD's block leads to clutch bucket

videos.description: Anthony Davis affirms his support for LeBron James after James' altercation with Isaiah Stewart.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Presser (AD calls Isaiah Stewart's antics 'uncalled for') 2021/11/21

videos.headline: AD calls Isaiah Stewart's antics 'uncalled for'

videos.description: Russell Westbrook learns he was assessed a technical foul during his news conference after the game.

videos.headline: Russ shocked to find out he got a tech
